main_header: A service which can change your reputation
tagline: This is a feedback controlling service. Change your future!
about_description:
Our commentarius is the best that can happens to you. We regulate reputation by means of a stream of feedbacks. We can work with projects of any complexity. We can lead you to top or lower competitors on a bottom. You decide - to become the first having used our services
or to remain mediocrity. Good luck!
parallax: We work with bad and with good feedbacks.
feature_1: Campaign which has many positive feedbacks have a high priority at the buyer.
feature_2: If you have many negative feedbacks, you can correct a situation with stream of positive feedbacks.
feature_3: We generate texts and responses after the deep analysis of your campaign that it looked more organically.
action: Take reputation of your company in hand
action_call: The earlier reputation of a campaign it will appear in your hands, the more clients you will receive.
price_description: Here you can calculate the cost of one feedback
